title: At Midnight It’s Another World - Novel Updates
tags: Crime   Criminals   Dark   Depictions of Cruelty   Detectives   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Akai "CRUX" Jounosuke   赤井"CRUX"錠之介
description: One day, the police arrest a man named Akihiko Noguchi. He is charged with violating the Misdemeanor Law by carrying a stun gun and handcuffs without a valid reason. However, the police had other aims. The police are looking for evidence and a confession during his 20-day detention, and Noguchi is trying to get away with ...... In between, this mystery film depicts the life of a young boy until he turns into a monster.>
